sentences.sentence: Hospitaller: that does not mean that there is no God. Do you love her?
sentences.translation: 豪斯·皮特勒：那并不意味着没有神。你爱她吗？

sentences.sentence: Hospitaller: all death is certain. I shall tell your father what Ive seen you become.
sentences.translation: 病院骑士：人终有一逝世。我会告诉令尊你的变换。

sentences.sentence: Hospitaller: all death is certain. I shall tell your father what I've seen you become.
sentences.translation: 医院骑士：人总归会有一死。我会告诉你父亲你已成才！
